item.title: 强台风 "康芮 "增强为超强台风，预计将登陆台湾
item.description: 预计它将于周四在台湾登陆，登陆地点靠近几周前遭受强风暴袭击的地区。【原文：Kong-Rey has strengthened into a super typhoon as it skirts the Philippines on track for Taiwan, where it’s expected to make landfall Thursday close to an area that was battered by a powerful storm just weeks ago.】

item.title: 印度开始研究控制最有害的温室气体
item.description: 印度政府和电力行业正在探讨逐步减少被认为是最有害的温室气体的可能性，尽管替代品的高昂成本阻碍了相关法规的出台。【原文：India’s government and the power industry are exploring a possible phase down of what’s considered to be the most potent greenhouse gas, although high costs of alternatives stand in the way of a regulation.】

item.title: 夜晚越来越热，气候变化导致睡眠减少
item.description:
《柳叶刀》杂志的一项研究显示，气温升高、干旱和暴雨正日益影响人们的健康。【原文：

Rising temperatures, drought and heavy rainfall are increasingly impacting people’s health, according to a Lancet study.

】

item.title: 日本核电复兴因缺乏工人而受到威胁
item.description: 本周，距离 2011 年日本大地震震中最近的一座核电站重新启动，这被日本政府誉为朝着复兴原子能迈出的重要一步。但这也提醒人们，技术工人的严重短缺可能会延缓核能的复苏。【原文：The restart of the nuclear power plant closest to the epicenter of Japan’s devastating 2011 earthquake this week was hailed by the government as a major step toward reviving atomic energy. It’s also been a reminder of the crippling shortage of skilled workers that could slow that comeback.】

item.title: 绿色宿醉蔓延，瑞典核电复兴面临质疑
item.description: 随着越来越多的公司对旨在清理世界上一些最肮脏行业的大型耗电绿色项目踩下刹车，瑞典的核能复兴面临被削弱的风险。【原文：Sweden’s nuclear revival risks being undermined as more companies pull the brakes on large power-hungry green projects designed to clean up some of the world’s dirtiest industries.】

item.title: 华尔街银行家开展环境、社会和管治债务转换，获得新的交易渠道
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：An emerging ESG debt market that’s been embraced by bankers at JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. is about to see its pipeline get a meaningful boost, thanks to an agreement struck in Colombia.】

item.title: 开发商获得租约以建设新英格兰漂浮风电场
item.description: Avangrid Inc. 和 Invenergy LLC 两家公司在周二的美国政府拍卖会上获得了在缅因湾约 43.9 万英亩土地上安装风力涡轮机的租约。【原文：Avangrid Inc. and Invenergy LLC units secured leases to install wind turbines across some 439,000 acres in the Gulf of Maine during a US government auction Tuesday, a week before a presidential election likely to dictate the shape of their development for years to come.】

item.title: 大型石油公司认为人工智能的蓬勃发展推动了美国天然气的 "疯狂需求
item.description: 被称为 "超大规模企业 "的科技巨头们正在快速发展云计算和人工智能，能源需求的激增正成为化石燃料行业的一大福音。【原文：A surge in energy demand from technology giants that are rapidly developing cloud computing and artificial intelligence — known as hyperscalers — is becoming a major boon for the fossil fuel industry.】

item.title: 南非玉米种植面积将创 2019 年以来最低纪录
item.description: 南非农民几乎不会增加明年用于种植玉米的土地，而且种植季节可能会推迟，这将加剧今年收成下滑四分之一、创五年新低后的玉米短缺问题。【原文：South African farmers will barely increase the land allocated to plant corn for next year’s crop and the season may be late, exacerbating a shortage after the harvest slumped a quarter to a five-year low this year.】

item.title: 古董耐克飞机如何暴露了价值 7 亿美元的碳市场的漏洞
item.description:
从野火到欺诈，一切都在增加碳抵消投资者的风险。现在又有了新的问题，即市场是如何为自己投保的。【原文：

Everything from wildfires to fraud is adding risk for investors in carbon offsets. Now there are new questions about how the market is trying to insure itself.

】

item.title: 台风 "天兔 "将掠过菲律宾，向台湾移动
item.description: 热带气旋 "孔-雷 "已增强为台风，有可能给菲律宾北部带来强风和暴雨，然后向台湾追踪并登陆。【原文：Tropical Cyclone Kong-Rey has intensified into a typhoon and is threatening to bring strong winds and torrential rain to the northern Philippines, before tracking toward Taiwan and making landfall.】

item.title: 英国能源行业在免费电力争夺战中出现分歧
item.description:
随着政府决定是否在各地区之间拆分电力定价，战线正在拉开。【原文：

Battle lines are being drawn as the government decides if it will split power pricing across regions.

】

item.title: 美国减税政策如何将中国太阳能巨头带到俄亥俄州
item.description:
《降低通货膨胀法案》恢复了美国制造业的就业机会，同时也让中国有机会扩大其在某些清洁能源技术领域的主导地位。【原文：

The Inflation Reduction Act restored American manufacturing jobs – and gave China an opportunity to extend its dominance in some clean energy technologies. 

】

item.title: 在具有里程碑意义的案件中，大型液化天然气生产商的清洁要求受到质疑
item.description: 一个激进的股东组织声称，天然气生产商桑托斯有限公司（Santos Ltd.）在其气候目标方面误导了投资者。【原文：One of the world’s first legal challenges over corporate greenwashing kicked off in an Australian court, with an activist shareholder group claiming natural gas producer Santos Ltd. misled investors on its climate targets.】

item.title: 日本将重启距离 2011 年地震最近的核电站
item.description: 离 2011 年日本大地震震中最近的核电站即将重启，这是日本重振原子能利用的一个重要里程碑。【原文：The nuclear power plant closest to the epicenter of the massive earthquake that rocked Japan in 2011 is poised to restart, a major milestone in the country’s bid to revive its use of atomic energy.】

item.title: 纳米比亚中央银行授权贷款人提供抗旱救济
item.description: 纳米比亚中央银行公布了一项政策，为该国遭受旱灾的农业提供财政援助。【原文：Namibia’s central bank unveiled a policy to provide financial relief to the country’s drought-hit farming industry.】

item.title: 绿党推动卡马拉-哈里斯加强拜登的气候斗争
item.description: 今天的时事通讯将关注卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）仍未定型的气候议程，以及如果她赢得美国总统大选，该议程将如何得到巩固。本篇报道的完整版可在 Bloomberg.com 上查阅。有关气候变化政治的更多报道，请订阅。【原文：Today’s newsletter looks at the still-amorphous climate agenda of Kamala Harris and how it might solidify if she wins the US presidency. The full version of this story is on Bloomberg.com. For more coverage of the politics of climate change, please subscribe.】

item.title: 供过于求，德国将削减部分太阳能发电场的补贴
item.description: 在可再生能源电力供过于求导致政府成本上升之后，德国计划缩小有资格获得补贴的太阳能生产商的范围。【原文：Germany plans to narrow the pool of solar producers that are eligible for subsidies after an oversupply of renewable power has led to rising costs for the government.】

item.title: 卡塔尔能源公司与道达尔公司合作在伊拉克建设超大型太阳能电站
item.description: 卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）已同意与道达尔能源 SE 公司（TotalEnergies SE）合作，在伊拉克南部建设一个超大型太阳能发电场。【原文：QatarEnergy has agreed to join TotalEnergies SE in a project to build a very large solar farm in southern Iraq, where the two energy companies already cooperate on a gas venture.】

item.title: 摩根大通称人工智能电力需求使美国供水紧张
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. says the US is facing significant strains on its water supply that have the potential to harm the world’s largest economy and eat into corporate valuations.】

item.title: 消息称 Ardian 正就收购 ICG 支持的绿色公司 Akuo 进行深入谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，法国收购公司 Ardian SAS 正在就收购 Akuo Energy SAS 进行深入谈判。【原文：French buyout firm Ardian SAS is in advanced talks to buy Akuo Energy SAS, a French solar and wind-farm developer part-owned by Intermediate Capital Group, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿联酋马斯达尔公司将绿色氢能产能目标推迟至 2030 年以后
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国的主要可再生能源公司已将其绿色氢气产能目标推迟到 2030 年以后，这是清洁能源生产面临挑战的最新迹象。【原文：The main renewables energy company in the United Arab Emirates has pushed back its target for green hydrogen capacity beyond 2030, the latest sign of the challenges facing production of the clean power source.】

item.title: 阿亚娜-伊丽莎白-约翰逊（Ayana Elizabeth Johnson）说，下周投票将讨论气候进步问题
item.description:
《如果我们做对了呢？希望选民记住，地方选举也很重要。【原文：

The author of What If We Get It Right? wants voters to remember that local elections matter, too.

】

item.title: 联合国气候主管警告 "火车失事 "迫在眉睫 1.5 摄氏度存疑
item.description: 联合国的最新分析表明，世界将以压倒性的数量无法实现本十年的减排目标，这意味着全球变暖很可能带来更大的危险。【原文：The world is on course to miss a target for cutting emissions this decade by an overwhelming amount, new UN analysis shows, meaning more dangerous global warming is likely.】

item.title: 科氏签署首笔以回收率承诺为支撑的锂交易
item.description: 科氏公司（Koch）与美国一家锂风险投资公司签署了一项协议，将提供一项业界首创的技术，保证利用其新的提取方法从咸水中回收至少 95% 的金属。【原文：Koch, Inc. signed a deal with a US lithium venture to provide technology that includes an industry-first guarantee of recovering at least 95% of the metal from salty water using its new extraction methods.】

item.title: 填补卡马拉-哈里斯气候议程的空白
item.description:
气候鹰派人士正在提出加快清洁技术发展和阻碍化石燃料使用的计划，这将超越拜登总统的遗产。【原文：

Climate hawks are putting forward plans to accelerate clean technologies and impede fossil fuels, pushing beyond President Biden's legacy.

】

item.title: 越南咖啡产区开始收获时被暴雨浸泡
item.description: 热带风暴 "特拉米 "在越南主要咖啡种植区的部分地区降下暴雨，而此时世界上最大的罗布斯塔咖啡生产国正开始收获咖啡豆。【原文：Tropical Storm Trami has dumped heavy rain across some parts of Vietnam’s key coffee-growing region, just as the world’s biggest producer of robusta starts harvesting beans.】

item.title: 煤气炉与欧洲每年 40,000 例过早死亡有关
item.description:
科学家们一直在研究室内燃气烹饪污染对成人和儿童健康造成的危害。【原文：

Scientists have been investigating the health risks pollution from cooking with gas indoors poses to adults and children. 

】

item.title: 印度城市寻求气候资金，绿色市政债券不断增长
item.description: 越来越多的印度城市正在考虑发行首批绿色债券，试图利用印度规模虽小但不断扩大的市政债务市场为气候行动提供资金。【原文：More Indian cities are considering issuing their first green bonds, seeking to tap the nation’s small-but-expanding municipal debt market to fund climate action.】

item.title: 南非任命奥尔弗为气候委员会副主席
item.description: 南非已选定克里斯潘-奥尔弗（Crispian Olver）从 11 月 1 日起担任总统气候委员会新任副主席。【原文：South Africa has picked Crispian Olver as the new deputy chairman of the Presidential Climate Commission from Nov. 1.】
